description: To demolish all existing structures and erect a part 7, part 9 storey building comprising 147 apartments (122 studios, 24 x 1 bed, 1 x 2 bed, incorporating 7 wheelchair accessible apartments, 11 ground floor Use Class B1, A2 commercial units, ground floor gallery space (Use Class D2), first floor restaurant, 42 basement car parking spaces, 147 cycle spaces, bin/plant/storage areas, 2 reception areas, amenity courtyard and associated hard and soft landscaping fronting St James Street.
site_address: Land bounded by St James Street/Norfolk Street and Brick Street, Liverpool, L1 0BE
